name: chatbot-project
description: Full-stack chatbot application with FastAPI backend and Next.js frontend

scripts.dev:backend: cd backend && source activate_venv.sh && python main.py
scripts.install:all: npm run install:backend && npm run install:frontend
scripts.install:backend: cd backend && source activate_venv.sh && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.clean: npm run clean:backend && npm run clean:frontend
scripts.clean:backend: cd backend && find . -type d -name __pycache__ -exec rm -rf {} + && find . -name '*.pyc' -delete
scripts.start:backend: cd backend && source activate_venv.sh && uvicorn main:app --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8000
